Project Overview

ReStore is a complete e-commerce platform I built to strengthen my skills in full-stack web development. This project showcases my ability to design and implement a functional, user-friendly online shopping website.

With features like browsing products, adding items to the shopping cart, and proceeding to checkout, ReStore demonstrates both frontend and backend development expertise.

Key Features

Frontend

  • Built with React & TypeScript: Ensures type safety and maintainable code.
  • Responsive Design with MUI: Provides a visually appealing interface across desktop and mobile devices.
  • State Management with Redux: Efficiently handles the global state across the application.
  • Theme Switching: Offers both dark and light modes for a customizable user experience.

Backend

  • C# and .NET 6: Provides a reliable backend framework for handling data and APIs.
  • EF Core with SQLite: Ensures efficient data storage and CRUD operations.
  • Real-Time Communication with WebSockets: Adds dynamic features for seamless updates.

Advanced Features

  • Real-Time Updates: Users experience live notifications and updates powered by WebSockets.
  • Dynamic Theming: The ability to switch between light and dark modes enhances usability and personalization.
  • Scalable State Management: Redux handles application state effectively, ensuring scalability for future enhancements.
